extendedInfo.description: NYC Bus & Subway Maps offers something very simple, yet invaluable to both native and tourist alike. Complete offline access to the official MTA Subway and Bus Maps for all five boroughs of New York City. A return to it's original no-frills design, NYC Bus & Subway Maps is an app you can count on working when you need it most. When you first launch the app, you won't have any map's available, but all you have to do is click the "Download Maps Now" button and select as many or as few as you want and download them all at once. No more hoping you remembered to save that BX Bus map when you're already on the train!Features Include:- Multi-Touch pinch-to-zoom where supported, or double-tap to zoom in, tap the zoom-out button to zoom out- Batch download multiple maps in the background- Quick links to the MTA's online route details- Create custom home screen shortcuts to any map or quick-link- Choose where to save you map tiles (defaults to SD Card)

reviews.title: Perfect, reliable
reviews.comment: Works perfectly, useful for offline maps when underground or no internet. Up to date.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very informative. I really like this app but I would love it if it had a real time schedule for the upcoming buses and subway train arrival times.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I\'ve downloaded the maps that I use and need and they work perfectly...  the zoom and clarity is great.  Excellent App
reviews.author: Lee Lord

reviews.title: Awesome NYC transit maps.
reviews.comment: Nice to have your own offline maps if you live, work or travel to NYC without having to lean over strangers to view maps. Love the ability to add and delete maps. Evo 3D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pure Crap!
reviews.comment: Crap! I have to download the maps...ok. But I can\'t see what I am downloading, just blank spaces with check boxes under the subway map and bus maps. Ahhh no thanks.......deleted.
reviews.author: Allison Maurice

reviews.comment: Why would they revert back to the old version???? The one i lost thanks to an \"update\" was way better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: An oldie, but goody.
reviews.comment: This has come in handy many times while actually riding underground on the NYC subway - it works offline and the program loads onto the SD card. The only extra I would like to see would be all subway entrances listed for each stop, however, it\' s been a while since this program has been updated (2011), so it\'s probably unlikely.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Display problem?
reviews.comment: Using samsung note 2. Went to download map but only blank with many boxes on the right under \342\200\234bus map\342\200\235. So does it mean there are different maps to choose from? No time to play around as we only stay in nyc for 2 days. Sorry for the mean feedback but i cannot use it.
reviews.author: Mii Tsang

reviews.title: Simply great.
reviews.comment: Its nice to have maps and other information without having to sift through tons of sites. I can\'t wait for the live updates.

reviews.title: Great Offline Maps
reviews.comment: The best part is that you can download all the maps for use offline. Awesome app. The only issue is that it won\'t show bus schedules.

reviews.title: Not bad.
reviews.comment: The maps are very good, but it\'s not possible to download the bus notes.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Lived in NYC all my life, but every once in a while you just need to check the routes. Love it. very useful and handy. Works great on Motorola Atrix 4g

reviews.comment: Really snappy and clear maps compared to nycmate at zoomed in level. Much faster than viewing the PDF map.
